title: Manjaro Linux  XFCE  0.8.7.1  (x86-x64)

Manjaro ist als Rolling Release ausgelegt - die einzelnen

* Community Editions of Manjaro Linux are released as bonus
flavours in addition to those officially supported and
maintained by the Manjaro Team, provided that the time and
resources necessary are available to do so. You can find
them at SourceForge. However they might be slightly
out-of-date.
